text.more:
This graph shows the countries of birth of Locke's correspondents. It illustrates the extent to which Locke pulled together largely disparate communities.

This export is one of a small number of test exports among many; each correspondent has metadata encoded in upwards of forty categories; we provide these examples for illustrative effect.
text.intro: This graph shows the countries of birth of Locke's correspondents. It illustrates the extent to which Locke pulled together largely disparate communities.
text.title: Locke's Correspondents
